label: additionalDescription
comment: An additional textual description for this trade product.

domainIncludes.comment: Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.
A photograph or video still represented as a digital image for electronic sharing.
The information that enables the reconciliation of a payment with the item(s) that the payment is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.
Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.
